      • dbConnect

        public static void dbConnect​(java.lang.String JDBC_URL)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        methode to connect to the database
        Parameters:
        JDBC_URL - the url to connect to the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the connection failed, an error is raised, catch, displayed and thrown.

      • dbDisconnect

        public static void dbDisconnect()
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Methode to close the connection with the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the disconnection failed, an error is raised, catch and then thrown.

      • dbExecuteQuery

        public static javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet dbExecuteQuery​(java.lang.String getAll,
                                                           java.lang.String JDBC_URL)
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        this methode holds all the entries from the database and return them to an ObservableList. For insertion, use dbExecuteUpdate()
        Parameters:
        getAll - a sql String
        JDBC_URL - an url (see createURL() and createURLSimple())
        Returns:
        databaseEntries
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a sql error happens, it is raised.

      • dbExecuteUpdate

        public static void dbExecuteUpdate​(java.lang.String sqlStmt,
                                   java.lang.String JDBC_URL)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        DB Execute Update (For Update/Insert/Delete) Operation
        Parameters:
        sqlStmt - the query to be executed
        JDBC_URL - the url
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the sql transaction failed, an error is raised.

      • setupUserDBWithPasswordConnection

        public static void setupUserDBWithPasswordConnection​(java.lang.String JDBC_URL,
                                                     java.lang.String passwordDB,
                                                     java.lang.String setupPasswordString)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Set a password value to the userDB for security and queries.
        Parameters:
        JDBC_URL - url to connect to the database
        passwordDB - the password to be set
        setupPasswordString - a sql statement to be executed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the transaction failed, an error is raised.

      • resetUserPwd

        public static void resetUserPwd​(java.lang.String reset,
                                java.lang.String newUserDBPassword)
        methode to reset the database password.
        Parameters:
        reset - the query for resetting the password of the user
        newUserDBPassword - the new password

      • createURL

        public static java.lang.String createURL()
        methode to create an url to connect to the db This methode create the full url with: databaseName user passwordDB territory collation dataEncryption encryptionKeyLength encryptionAlgorithm bootPassword
        Returns:
        JDBC_URL the url created

        Returns:

      • getConnectionInstance

        public static void getConnectionInstance()
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Methode to print the instance of the connection in the console (debugging)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the connection is closed and error is raided, which means the connection is closed.

      • shutdownDB

        public static void shutdownDB()
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Methode to shutdown the database properly.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the db is shutdown, an error is raided.
